headline: Ameriprise Financial Names Brian Mora Senior Vice President of Experienced Advisor Recruiting
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 09, 2024--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) today announced that Brian Mora has been named Senior Vice President of Experienced Advisor Recruiting. Mora has more than 20 years with Ameriprise, most recently as regional vice president in the central region of the firm’s branch channel. In his new role, he will lead a nationwide team of recruiters and field leaders responsible for bringing quality experienced advisors from across the industry to Ameriprise. Mora will rep
